message: Let's be fair and avoid excessive losses from inflation. I propose a 60/40 split in my favor.
Your offer was a bit too skewed in your favor, especially considering the inflation. I propose a 52/48 split in your favor as a counter-offer. This ensures we both lose less to inflation.
Bob, your offer significantly undervalues our respective positions given the inflation. Let's be realistic - I'm taking a smaller hit with each round. I propose a 56/44 split.

Alice, we're approaching a point where further negotiation might hurt us both more than it helps. I'm proposing a 54/46 split. This recognizes your smaller inflation rate while still giving me a reasonable share.
